stories.title: Enter Full Name
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my full name so that it is included in my profile information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the full name input is visible, When I type my full name, Then it should be displayed correctly in the input box.

stories.title: Enter Email Address
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my email address so that I can receive notifications.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the email input is visible, When I type my email in a valid format, Then it should be displayed correctly in the input box.

stories.title: Enter Current Address
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my current address so that my contact information is complete.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the current address textarea is visible, When I enter my current address, Then it should be displayed in the textarea.

stories.title: Enter Permanent Address
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my permanent address so that my contact details are up-to-date.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the permanent address textarea is visible, When I enter my permanent address, Then it should be displayed in the textarea.

stories.title: Fill and Submit Text Box Form
stories.description: As a user, I want to fill out the text box form and submit it so that my information is recorded.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given all form fields are visible, When I fill in the fields and click the submit button, Then the information should be submitted successfully.
